video.title: Intro to Cloud Computing and AWS
video.description:
What is cloud computing? What are the characteristics? What I can do with it? What is AWS? What service does it offers?

Next video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WMT6-pnOD8Q

🔗Marcia's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSLIvjWJwLRQze9Pn4cectQ

🔗Marcia's website: http://marciavillalba.com

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: Noah Nobody
topLevelComment.text: 0:35 I thought this was shared hosting. So what was/is shared hosting, the thing you pay monthly for and in return get an allocation of storage and bandwidth.

topLevelComment.author: Aman S.
topLevelComment.text: Cannot understand the accent. Please provide captions.

topLevelComment.author: Deependra Singh
topLevelComment.text: plz work on your accent a little. Thank you btw

topLevelComment.author: brian van vlymen
topLevelComment.text: please fix close caption so we can understand. It won't let me turn on auto-generated.

topLevelComment.author: João Felipe
topLevelComment.text: Thank you for the explanation, Marcia. It was very descritive. I am eager to see more videos about it.

topLevelComment.author: Simone Icardi
topLevelComment.text: it sounds like a plane hostess announcement quite a bit, but very nice one anyway :-)
